title: PSA: H&M is offering a 20% off student discount - here are the 20 best buys
text:
Autumn/winter is nearly here and H&M’s new-season drops are actually making us yearn for a chill in the air. Can’t justify a cold weather haul quite yet? Students, hit up UNiDAYs for a 20% discount (it’s normally 10%). The promotional code applies to everything full price on the site, so those cute checked coats and cozy cashmere knits just got a whole lot cheaper. To get this discount, all you need to do is fill out the H&M validation form via UNiDAYs (sign up and see the full terms here). But, since the offer is valid for a limited time only, we suggest you get on it asap. Need some help deciding what to buy? We’ve rounded up our top 20 faves on the site right now.

We earn a commission for products purchased through some of the links in this article.
